description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with CCM CONSTRUCTION. The average
  contract duration was 0.77 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.4M. The longest
  contract was 1.56 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.1M.
